Title: 610 - Glueing 2D Shapes to 2D Shapes
Tip: 2D Glue requires dynamically using a function that contains a reference to the target.

Summary.What: When the target shape is moved, the source shape must adjust to stay connected.
Summary.Why: 1D shapes must adjust their size and orientation to stay connected in the diagram.
Summary.How: The function is executed as part of the source shapes render cycle.
